law.text: A provision agreeing to arbitrate any or all disputes that may arise at some future date contained in an automobile liability or motor vehicle liability insurance policy delivered, issued for delivery or renewed in this state, shall not be binding upon the named insured or any person claiming under him.
law.history: Created 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 301, subtit. 20, sec. 5, effective June 18, 1970.
